author: jstrachan
msg: The <xtags:parse> tag can now take an optional flag to indicate whether validation should be performed or not

author: jstrachan
msg: Applied patch submitted by Brian De Vries for the style tag which passes a URIResolver into the JAXP TransformerFactory for resolving URIs and URLs properly within the web context

author: jstrachan
msg: Added patch to bug found by and the test case submitted by Manuel Tromm - many thanks Manuel

author: jstrachan
msg: Added support for <xtags:copy> tag which performs a shallow copy of an element
